posts.post_content:
Available for sale are the following cards:

Jack White (Piedmont) - SOLD
Jack Dunn (Piedmont/Likely Trimmed) - SOLD
Lee Tannehill (Sweet Caporal) - SOLD
Fred Snodgrass (Sweet Caporal/Catching) - SOLD
Fred Snodgrass (Piedmont/Batting) - SOLD
Harry McIntyre (Sweet Caporal/Brooklyn and Chicago National) - SOLD
Bill Nattress (Piedmont) - SOLD
Bill Milligan (Piedmont) - SOLD
Lucky Wright (Piedmont) - SOLD
Harry Howell (Piedmont) - SOLD
Heinie Wagner (Piedmont/Left Shoulder) - SOLD
Heinie Wagner (Sweet Caporal/Right Shoulder) - SOLD
Admiral Schlei (Sweet Caporal) - SOLD
Ed Reulbach (Piedmont) - SOLD
Jack Powell (Piedmont) - SOLD
Ambrose Puttman (Piedmont) - SOLD
Wild Bill Donovan (Piedmont) - SOLD
Frank LaPorte (Piedmont) - SOLD
Herbie Moran (Piedmont) - SOLD
Wildfire Schulte (Piedmont) - SOLD

Please add $10 for Shipping and Handling (if over $100)

If you want to purchase any of these cards:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card. This post will secure the card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
